title: Bounty Hunter Trax45
author: Bounty Hunter Trax45
content: The Bounty campaign will be managed by Bounty Hunter Trax45. 2. 80,000 $HGPT are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.3. The bounty program was launched on May 11. 2023.4. The reward distribution of HGPT Bounty Campaign Team Group distribution.__________________________Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed.Bounty Hunter may perform additional reviews, including but not limited to requesting other documentation for analysis of your joinedcampaigns if needed.Bounty Hunter Trax45 is under no obligation to send your bounty reward and may, at its discretion, cancel your participation from each ongoingbounty if the participant does not follow the rules mentioned on this bounty thread.Bounty Hunter Trax45 has no contribution to the token distribution; unless it announces the exact opposite on group and channel. We are onlyresponsible for the reward distribution of any campaign when we publish it, unless explicitly stated "Bounty Hunter Trax45 has Notescrowed and guarantees the reward distribution of this bounty."The USD value of the bounty reward pool is estimated, and it might change regarding different factors. We usually announce the rewards bycalculating their final token sale price if it is not listed on any exchange yet.Our team has carefully researched the project following several criteria as we did for all of the campaigns we have managed or published.However, we can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We areresponsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity.A crypto project has too many factors in reaching their targets. We are not in the team of any project and not their employees, and we can'tguarantee the future progress of any project only because we manage their bounty as freelancers. We encourage everyone to do their research and due diligence before investing their time or money. Participating in this bountycampaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.Kind regards.______________________1. All participants must join HGPT Bounty To HGPT official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel, 2. All participants must join Bounty Hunter Trax45 Telegram Group, Telegram Channel, Twitter. discord 3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign andan instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty Hunter Trax45 Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty programimmediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join.7. Participants with a minimum of 90+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the social media campaigns,8. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address beforeregistration for any campaign.9. Negative Trusted Accounts may be allowed into this Campaign if the reason for red trust is libel or unjustifiable.Final Decision is at the Bounty manager's discretion if you have a massively red trusted account or acquiretoo many negatives during the campaign, you accept the risk that you might be eventually removed and your stakes voided.10. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.11. All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculatedon a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted._____________Proof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address:Code:Twitter CampaignRetweet Link:1.2.3.4.5.Tweet Link:1.2.Telegram CampaignOther Group Post:1.2.3.4.5.Discord CampaignPost1. 2.3.4.5.Twitter           40%Telegram       30%Discord         20%Note: Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter:  First 400approved participants.Telegram: First 300approved Participants.Discord: First 200 approved  participants. selected.Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread <--Week 1 (12.05._18.05)Week 2 (19.05_26.05)Rewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow HGPT Twitter Page Follow2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweets/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 1Day minimum.5. Participants must use $HGPT #HyperGPT #BSC#NFT hashtags in every retweet or tweet.How to join:1. Join HGPT Official telegram Group2. Join Bounty Hunter Telegram Group, Twitter3. Fill the registration form:JOIN NOWstakes/weekRules:1. Every participant must follow HGPT Bounty Telegram.2. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | HyperGPT(Example: Bounty Hunter Trax45 | HyperGPT)3. Replace your profile picture with Telegram Logo.4. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more thanone project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.5. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You mustinteract with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign.Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.6. other Telegram Group Post .7. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.8. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.9. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.10. You must wear Bounty Hunter Trax45 avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.How to join:1. Join HGPT Official telegram Group2. Join Bounty Hunter Telegram Group, Twitter3. Fill the registration form:JOIN NOW Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Every participant must join HGPT Discord Channel.2. Participants have to interact with each other on HGPT Discord channel.3. Participants have to write 5 constructive messages with each other per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).4. Time gap between 2 messages needs to be 1 day minimum.5. Meaningless,irrelevant messages or copy and pasting messages by changing the project name are not counted, tryto help other users by providing the correct information regarding the project. Either youcan ask questions or help others with proper answers regarding the project.6. Please take the screenshot of your message and upload it on Imgur or similar websites.Then submit that link during report submission.How to join:1. Join HGPT Official telegram Group2. Join Bounty Hunter Telegram Group, Twitter3. Fill the registration form:JOIN NOW
